help.long:
`<category>`: Lists commands in <category>.
`<command>`: Shows more detailed information and usage for a command.

server.long: Shows information about your server, such as member, channel, role, and emoji counts, and creation date.

user.usage:
/user `<user>`
Use `me` for yourself. Accepts @mentions and IDs.
user.long:
Shows information about a specified user, including:
- Status
- Discord/Server Join Date
- ID
- Role Information

base.long:
Converts `<number>` from base `<base>` to base `<target>`.
Currently supports bases 2-62.
Bases 11-36 are not case-sensitive.
101010010110

apod.short: Shows the NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day
apod.long: Shows the NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day

element.long:
Shows information about an element.
`<element>` accepts Name, Atomic Mass, and Atomic Number.

fun.description: Fun commands such as cat images

animal.long: Shows a random '<animal>' image. Currently there is cat, dog, fox, bird, and panda.

time.long: Gets time and date in UTC, will add timezone feature later.
